title: Moles of HI needed to produce 2.5 mol of I2

content.description: 10 HI + 2 KMnO4 + 3 H2SO4 â†’ 5 I2 + 2 MnSO4 + K2SO4 + 8 H2O
content.question: According to the balanced equation above, how many moles of HI would be necessary to produce 2.5 mol of I2, starting with 4.0 mol of KMnO4 and 3.0 mol of H2SO4 ?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
